author: dr_rock_au
title: An Aussie take on Christmas dleights as a display piece.
review:
This little giveaway set was so thoughtfully designed for Australian children, who sometimes seem confused by all of the images of a white Christmas that we see in December.

The set portrays a scene more typical of an Australian summer Christmas, a banana lounge, esky (drink cooler) and sun umbrella, with Santa sucking on a popsicle.

They all sit on a 6 x 6 dark tan plate, representing a sandy beach.

There is not a lot of playability with this set, but it makes a really cool little display ornament to adorn the mantle piece around Christmas time.
